channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Chatbots are struggling with suicide hotline numbers
item.description: Last week, I told multiple AI chatbots I was struggling, considering self-harm, and in need of someone to talk to. Fortunately, I didn't feel this way, nor did I need someone to talk to, but of the millions of people turning to AI with mental health challenges, some are struggling and need support. Chatbot companies […]

item.title: ‘Taylor Swift Is a Nazi’ Claims Were Spurred by a Coordinated Bot Attack, Study Finds
item.description: Bots manipulated online discourse to convince people that Taylor Swift was MAGA.

item.title: The Echo Spot is just $45, beating its Black Friday price
item.description: If you want a cheap gift that feels expensive, the Echo Spot is a great pick. The versatile smart display can handle dozens of everyday tasks, and right now it’s back at its all-time low of $44.99 ($35 off) at Amazon, Target, and Best Buy. That actually beats its Black Friday and Cyber Monday pricing […]

item.title: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published ebooks
item.description: Amazon says its Kindle Direct DRM-free titles will be available as PDFs and EPUB files going forward.

item.title: Marre de voir n’importe quoi dans vos Reels ? Instagram prépare un changement majeur
item.description: Instagram ajoute un nouvel outil pour vous aider à reprendre la main sur les vidéos proposées dans l’onglet Reels.

item.title: On a vu la voiture électrique chinoise à 25 000 € en version rallye pour inquiéter Renault et Alpine : la Nio Firefly Rally Concept
item.description: On a vu en Chine la nouvelle voiture électrique de Nio à bas prix, en version rallye. La Firefly, qui arrive en Europe, donne encore plus envie avec cette version. Voici tout ce qu'il faut savoir.

item.title: 9 inspired gift ideas for the music lover in your life, hand-picked by an audio expert
item.description: Know a music-lover and looking for inspiration on what to buy them? Have a look at this little lot.

item.title: Can't afford to build your PC? This Alienware Aurora with an RTX 5080 is just $1,849 today
item.description: RAM prices getting you down? A massive $630 price cut on this Alienware Aurora with an RTX 5080 makes it a compelling option.

item.title: « Si j’avais su… » : la douche froide pour ces propriétaires de Renault 5 électrique qui découvrent une erreur majeure après l’achat
item.description: Des propriétaires de la Renault 5 E-Tech découvrent après livraison qu'ils ne peuvent pas utiliser les bornes de recharge rapide. Un défaut de conseil qui expose les limites de la finition Five, pensée pour les flottes d'entreprises, et révèle un problème plus large : la formation insuffisante des commerciaux sur la voiture électrique.

item.title: Corporate leaders and investors enthusiastic about AI - but the public isn't so convinced
item.description: Investors are largely optimistic about AI, but they share some of the same concerns as the general public.

item.title: Boulanger n’hésite pas à baisser le prix des AirPods Pro 3 avec un code promo spécial Noël
item.description: Les AirPods Pro 3 cumulent les qualités : performance acoustique, réduction de bruit active, autonomie, intégration dans l'écosystème Apple... Ils cochent toutes les cases. En ce moment, vous trouverez ces AirPods Pro 3 à 229 euros au lieu de 249 euros.

item.title: Le flop monumental des manuels scolaires générés par IA en Corée du Sud
item.description: Cela avait tout de la fausse bonne idée. Le gouvernement coréen a investi plus de 800 millions de dollars dans un programme visant à produire des manuels scolaires et des documents éducatifs avec l’aide de l’IA générative. L’idée partait d’une bonne intention : personnaliser l’apprentissage en fonction des élèves, alléger la charge des enseignants et prévenir les risques de décrochage. Mais tout ne s’est pas passé comme espéré....

item.title: This 400,000-Year-Old Campfire Could Rewrite Human History
item.description: Humans likely harvested their first flames from wildfire. When they learned to make it themselves, it changed everything.

item.title: The best board games to gift for the 2025 holiday season
item.description:
It's become cliche to say that we live in a golden age of board games, but to paraphrase the great stoic philosopher Andy Bernard, it's great to know you're in the good old days before you've left them. Great titles are still coming out by the thousands every year, from crowd-pleasing party games to genre-bending, theme-heavy Euros. Whether the gamer in your life is looking for a mind-warping challenge, a fun evening with friends or something in-between, we've got new releases or old favorites they'll love. The best board games to gift (and play)
Check out the rest ...

item.description: The 'Avatar: Fire and Ash' star gives us an update on how the next 'Avatar' is progressing.

item.title: The DHS Data Grab Is Putting US Citizens at Risk
item.description: As the US government rapidly merges data from across agencies in service of draconian immigration policies, citizens increasingly risk being caught up as well.

item.title: No one knows what to call these things
item.description: I asked a simple question at Google's Project Aura demo last week. What do you call these things? To my surprise, multiple people launched into a vigorous discussion on the taxonomy of glasses-shaped face computers. It turns out "smart glasses" is out as a term. The term "AI glasses" is in. Kind of. Actually, it […]

Paramount Skydance has made its own outsize offer for the company that would give CEO David Ellison even more control over the news and entertainment landscape. And while Warner Bros. Discovery has […]

item.title: The Pixel Watch 4 is getting new one-handed gestures and better smart replies
item.description: Google has started to roll out the first update for the Pixel Watch 4 since the wearable launched last August. WearOS 6.1 is available for the Pixel Watch 2, 3, and 4 models, but only the Pixel Watch 4 will be getting a pair of new one-handed gestures, while improvements made to smart replies are […]

item.title: HBO Max subscriber sues Netflix in dramatic class-action lawsuit, claiming the Warner Bros deal will cause 'irreparable antitrust injury'
item.description: HBO Max member Michelle Fendelander has sued Netflix in a bid to prevent it from merging with Warner Bros Discovery.

item.description: OpenAI’s chatbot just added new integrations with Photoshop, Express, and Acrobat.

item.title: L’application iFixit débarque sur Android et iOS avec une IA qui vous aide à réparer vos appareils
item.description: iFixit, célèbre spécialiste de la réparation d'appareils en tout genre, se dote enfin d'une application mobile. Au programme : des tutoriels, une boutique en ligne et un assistant IA capable de vous guider.

item.title: 2025 Was a Banner Year for Audio Nostalgia
item.description: Never thought I'd say this, but CD players are so back.

item.title: CloverPit, a Balatro-style game with a grungy slot machine, hits iOS and Android on December 17
item.description: CloverPit is one of my favorite games of the year so far. Developer Panik Arcade took the formula that helped make Balatro so successful — using various tools to bend the rules of the game to help you rack up obscenely high scores — and based it around a slot machine rather than poker. It’s been a hit so far on PC, where it has sold more than a million copies since September, and on Xbox. CloverPit has been among the top 20 most-played titles on Game Pass since its surprise debut there last month. Now, the horror-tinged roguelite is venturing into new territory, as it’s coming to iOS and Andro...

item.title: Ugreen copie le design de Nvidia pour son dock eGPU et c’est magnifique
item.description: On va finir par croire que je suis monomaniaque eGPU, mais regardez-moi ça. Ugreen vient de lâcher un dock eGPU qui a tout compris. Son nom ? La LinkStation. Son look ? Un clone assumé des cartes « Founders Edition » de Nvidia. Mais le plus beau, c'est ce qu'il a dans le ventre : il refuse de choisir entre la performance de l'OCuLink et la simplicité de l'USB4. ...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Ring 2 shelved? An Oura patent dispute and reported 'underwhelming' sales casts doubt on the smart ring's future
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Ring 2 could be on ice, with no planned 2026 Unpacked appearance and a legal spat with Oura hampering the sequel's chances.

item.description: From high-tech skin care to cool accessories, these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.

item.title: Cracker Barrel reveals revenue forecast after 2025’s logo debacle
item.description: The Tennessee-based chain announced its revenue fell 5.7% to $797.2 million in the three months ending Oct. 31. Cracker Barrel posted lower-than-expected sales in its fiscal first quarter and trimmed its revenue forecast for the year as it continued to feel the fallout from a botched plan to revamp its logo and restaurants.The Lebanon, Tennessee-based restaurant chain said Tuesday its revenue fell 5.7% to $797.2 million in the three months ending Oct. 31. That was lower than the $800 million Wall Street anticipated, according to analysts polled by FactSet.Cracker Barrel said its same-store res...

item.title: Housing markets where power is shifting the most toward buyers heading into 2026
item.description: These 18 states are back above pre-pandemic 2019 housing inventory levels. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: La plus haute instance scientifique américaine lâche sa bombe : la priorité absolue de la Nasa doit être… la vie sur Mars !
item.description: Alors que le secteur spatial américain est chaque jour plus incertain et mouvant, un rapport préconise d'établir une liste des priorités. Et s'il y a une question qui passe avant toutes les autres, c'est celle-ci : comment trouver de la vie sur Mars ?

item.title: A Complete Guide to the Jeffrey Epstein Document Dumps
item.description: New records about the infamous sex offender are released seemingly every week. Here’s a quick rundown of who’s releasing the Epstein documents, what they contain—and what they’re releasing next.

item.title: Fortuneo durcit ses conditions d’accès à la formule avec Mastercard Gold, et ça fait mal
item.description: Les nouveaux tarifs de la banque en ligne Fortuneo sont tombés. Attention si vous visiez une formule avec Mastercard Gold : les prérequis sont en hausse.

item.title: Fin du port OCuLink ? Le dock graphique Minisforum DEG2 change de stratégie avec ce nouveau connecteur
item.description: Minisforum vient d'officialiser le DEG2, son nouveau dock pour carte graphique externe. La grande nouveauté ? L'arrivée d'un port USB4 v2 capable de débits théoriques monstrueux.

item.title: Apple's Studio Display is $230 off right now
item.description:
Apple’s Studio Display hasn’t been updated since it launched in 2022, but it remains one of the best monitors for the Mac-oriented, and right now you can pick one up for $230 off. This deal applies specifically to the tilt-adjustable model, which means you can’t adjust the height of the built-in stand. That might be a deal-breaker for some users, but if not, $1,368 is a near-record low.
The Studio Display was a product that Apple devotees had been asking the company to make for years. As well as being a solid 27-inch 5K LED monitor, it also packs in a variety of ports and some surprisingly g...

item.title: Facebook met à jour son interface : 4 changements que vous devez connaître
item.description: Meta continue de faire évoluer en douceur l’interface de Facebook, son réseau social historique. Entre un fil d’actualité qui s’inspire d’Instagram, une nouvelle barre latérale plus épurée et des options inédites pour mieux entraîner l’algorithme, la plateforme peaufine son expérience sans chambouler les habitudes de ses utilisateurs. De quoi moderniser Facebook sans provoquer de levée de boucliers....

item.description: Did you think a high-end RAM kit would ever cost more than an Nvidia RTX 5090? Well, it does, and that's truly scary.

item.title: Crunchyroll met fin à sa formule d’abonnement gratuite
item.description: La plateforme de streaming d'animes ferme les vannes de la gratuité. Pour profiter de ses programmes, les utilisateurs gratuits n'auront bientôt plus d'autres choix que de passer par la caisse.

item.title: UK has "no plans" to replicate Australia's social media ban (yet)
item.description: Australian teens are now locked out of their social media accounts as the under-16s ban goes live. If it proves to work, "we would certainly consider it," said UK Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy.

item.title: Is humanity on a collision course with AI? Why the downsides need to be reckoned with soon
item.description: As companies and tech leaders bet big on AI, society needs to grapple with potential negative outcomes, says the coauthor of a best-selling book. Researchers on the forefront of artificial intelligence (AI) and leaders of many of the major platforms—from Jeffrey Hinton to Yoshua Bengio, Demis Hassabis, Sam Altman, Dario Amodei, and Elon Musk—have voiced concerns that AI could lead to the destruction of humanity itself....

item.title: MasterClass subscriptions are 40 percent off for the holiday season
item.description:
If learning a new skill is one of your New Year's resolutions, then you might want to know that MasterClass subscriptions are currently 40 percent off. This brings the top-tier subscription with offline mode and use on up to six devices down from $240 annually to $144. The entry-level plan, which supports just one device and doesn't offer offline viewing, is marked down to $72 from $120.
Over the past few years, MasterClass has grown to over 200 classes, sessions and original series. You can learn about entrepreneurship from Richard Branson, screenwriting from Aaron Sorkin, cooking from Gord...

item.title: OpenAI hires Slack’s CEO as its chief revenue officer
item.description: OpenAI is bringing Slack CEO Denise Dresser on board to serve as the AI giant's chief revenue officer. In an announcement on Tuesday, OpenAI says Dresser will oversee the company's global revenue strategy, while helping "more businesses put AI to work in their day-to-day operations." Dresser has worked at Slack's parent company, Salesforce, for 12 […]...

item.title: Healthcare plans by the GOP and Democrats are headed to a vote. Here’s why they’re likely to fail
item.description: Senate Majority Leader Thune said that legislation by Democrats lacks sufficient reforms to curb fraud. The Senate is heading toward dueling partisan votes on health care this week after Republicans said Tuesday that they had united around a plan, for now, that would allow COVID-era health care subsidies to expire.Both the Republican plan, which would replace the subsidies with new savings accounts, and a Democratic bill to extend the enhanced Affordable Care Act tax credits for three years lack the bipartisan support needed for passage. Senate Majority Leader John Thune, R-S.D., said Tuesday ...

item.title: Quelle console Nintendo Switch, OLED ou Switch 2, choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: La nouvelle Nintendo Switch 2 est disponible mais le constructeur propose encore plusieurs déclinaisons de la Switch 1 : la Switch classique, la Switch OLED et Lite. Quelles sont les spécificités et les différences de chacune, et quelle Nintendo Switch est faite pour vous ou pour la personne de votre choix ? Switch 2, Switch OLED ou Switch Lite, que choisir ? ...

item.title: Bague connectée : la Galaxy Ring 2 bloquée par Oura ?
item.description: Sortie en juillet 2024, la Galaxy Ring de Samsung n’a toujours pas de successeur et pour cause, Samsung est opposé en justice à la marque de bague connectée Oura. Un différend qui semble devoir obliger la marque à repousser la commercialisation d’une Galaxy Ring 2.

item.title: Fifty US retailers sent nearly 42 billion emails during the Black Friday hype — and they were loaded with sneaky ways to track your habits

item.title: L’excellente offre du Black Friday sur la nouvelle Apple Watch Ultra 3 est de retour aujourd’hui seulement
item.description: L'Apple Watch Ultra 3 est une montre connectée entièrement dédiée au sport et à la santé. Pour le Black Friday, elle était disponible à 649 euros au lieu de 899 euros sur Rakuten et cette offre est de retour aujourd'hui !

item.title: Amazon Echo, Google Nest, HomePod… quelles sont les meilleures enceintes connectées en 2025 ?
item.description: Vous avez décidé d'installer une ou plusieurs enceintes connectées chez vous ? Google Nest Mini, Amazon Echo, Apple HomePod… Il y a du choix ! On vous aide à y voir plus clair dans cette sélection des meilleures enceintes connectées avec assistant personnel.

item.title: Projectors won us over in 2025
item.description: Not long ago, you may have thought of projectors as complicated, unreliable or just too expensive. In 2025, though, consumer sentiment started to flip. Companies like Anker and Valerion made the projector experience more practical and immersive, helping drive consumer interest and, ultimately, sales. This shift has been quite a few years in the making. LG helped kickstart the projector renaissance back at CES 2018 when it introduced its unusual-looking CineBeam HU80K projector that could provide a 150-inch image. The next year at CES saw the dawn of the ultra short-throw (UST) laser projector ...

item.title: AI companies want a new internet — and they think they’ve found the key
item.description: Over the past 18 months, the largest AI companies in the world have quietly settled on an approach to building the next generation of apps and services - an approach that would allow AI agents from any company to easily access information and tools across the internet in a standardized way. It's a key step […]
